annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see § 258 of the New Columbia Statehood Initiative, Omnibus Boards and Commissions, and Election Transition Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-481, Nov. 18, 2014, 61 DCR 12133, 20 STAT 4405).

For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see § 258 of the New Columbia Statehood Initiative, Omnibus Boards and Commissions, and Election Transition Reform Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2015 (D.C. Act 21-7, Feb. 26, 2015, 62 DCR 2646, 21 STAT 807).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Approval to Install Bronze Commemorative Markers Pursuant to Section 6 of DC Law 12-98, the “Make a Difference Selection Committee Establishment Act of 1998”, see Mayor’s Order 2001-160, October 23, 2001 ( 48 DCR 10775).

annoGroup.heading: Delegation of Authority
annoGroup.annotation: Delegation of authority under D.C. Law 12-98, the “Make A Difference Selection Committee Establishment Act of 1998”, see Mayor’s Order 99-193, November 23, 1999 ( 46 DCR 9972).
